summary: Tarzan is a famous fictional character created by Edgar Rice Burroughs. He was a wild child, brought up by great apes in the African jungle. After trying civilization, he chose to go back to the wild, becoming a heroic adventurer. Tarzan first appeared in a 1912 magazine and later in many books, movies, and TV shows. He is known for his jungle adventures and being half-naked, wearing only a loincloth.
title: Tarzan
